@anton1r @BBCNews @anton1r @BBCNews exactly! And I can think of at least 3 million ways that money could have been better spent.
@O2 I'll DM, thanks.
@O2 no, no outstanding bill. My bill date, tariff etc have all remained the same, I've just had this extra charge applied.
@O2 I could see the extra line rental thing if I was a new customer but this was an upgrade. I'm totally baffled.
@O2 on live chat one of your colleagues admits I should be refunded for this but only when I upgrade in 2 years time. That's ludicrous!
@O2 I find it really odd that I'm charged an extra months line rental even through I've just upgraded and been with o2 for over 10 years
Seriously unclear and the only I discover this was going onto live chat. Not cool @Deliveroo
